    org.vanilladb.core.query.algebra

    • Uses of Bucket in org.vanilladb.core.query.algebra

      Methods in org.vanilladb.core.query.algebra that return Bucket 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Bucket SelectPlan.constantRangeBucket(Bucket bkt, ConstantRange cRange)
      Creates a new bucket by keeping the statistics of records and values in the specified bucket falling within the specified search range.
      static Bucket SelectPlan.joinFieldBucket(Bucket bkt1, Bucket bkt2, double numRec)
      Creates a new bucket by keeping the statistics of joining records and values from the two specified buckets.
      Methods in org.vanilladb.core.query.algebra with parameters of type Bucket 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      static Bucket SelectPlan.joinFieldBucket(Bucket bkt1, Bucket bkt2, double numRec)
      Creates a new bucket by keeping the statistics of joining records and values from the two specified buckets.
